About Us

The Filipino Student Association at the University of Oklahoma (OU FSA) is an organization dedicated to spreading cultural awareness on campus and creating a place where you belong! Our member base is diverse, and we welcome all races and ethnicities. We are committed to creating a family for every member and student interested in our vision.

Every fall semester, we host a Filipino Culture Night that highlights the local Filipino community and other communities across the nation to create waves of multi-cultural influence and awareness on campus. In the spring, we attend Goodphil, which is a massive regional competition featuring several Filipino organizations from different universities across Texas and Oklahoma. The competitions range from a variety of sports to dances, with participation numbers well into the thousands. Lastly, we host monthly general body meetings to strengthen the connections within our community, along with fun hangouts throughout the school year.

No matter where you come from, we look forward to making us your home away from home!
